Footer1: Docusign: It's time to agree better
Footer2: Docusign helps organizations connect and automate how they prepare, sign, act on, and manage agreements.

Card1.Title:
Change Your
Major or Minor
Card1.Description: Request changes to your major and/or minor fields of study
Card1.Features:
Docusign features:

  • Update recipient information
  • Create envelope from HTML import
  • Fill tab data
  • Embedded signing (recipient view)

Card2.Title:
Request
an Unofficial Transcript
Card2.Description: Get an unofficial copy of your most recent transcript
Card2.Features:
Docusign features:

  • Create an elastic template
  • Embed an elastic template on your site

Card3.Title:
Sign Up for
Extracurricular Activities
Card3.Description: One-stop shop for all your non-academic interests
Card3.Features:
Docusign features:

  • Update recipient information
  • Create envelope from HTML import
  • Fill tab data
  • Embedded signing (recipient view)
  • Request payment
